import './image-gallery.css'; //TODO: arreglar este import import React from 'react'; import Barra from './Barra'; import Footer from './Footer'; import { FaCreditCard, FaTruck, FaCartPlus } from 'react-icons/fa'; import ImageGallery from 'react-image-gallery'; import {Container, Row, Col, Card, Button, Accordion} from 'react-bootstrap'; class DetalleProducto extends React.Component{ async componentDidMount(){ await this.fetchProducto() } fetchProducto = async() => { let res = await fetch() let data = res.json() console.log(data) } render(){ const descripcion = "Zapatillas marca adidas fenomenales. Nuevas" const precio = "$ 150.000" const images = [ { original: "https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/bootstrapbaymisc/blog/24_days_bootstrap/vans.png", thumbnail: "https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/bootstrapbaymisc/blog/24_days_bootstrap/vans.png", }, { original: "https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/bootstrapbaymisc/blog/24_days_bootstrap/vans.png", thumbnail: "https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/bootstrapbaymisc/blog/24_days_bootstrap/vans.png", }, ]; return(

{descripcion}

{precio}
Paga en 12 Cuotas
Envios a todo el pais
Descripcion {descripcion} Opiniones Hello! I'm another body
) } } export default DetalleProducto
